messages.body:
ENGR. PETER ESEMUSA
         PETROLEUM TRUST FUND
         TEL: 234-803-7145080


          RE: NEED YOUR CO-OPERATION

Dear Sir,

I am Engr. peter esemusa, chairman contract award committee 
for the petroleum special trust fund.

I know that these letters will come to you as a surprise 
since we have not met in person please bear with me.

we are in search for a reliable and honest partner abroad 
that we can entrust with the sum of us$15million.(FIFTEEN 
THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS ONLY) these funds originated 
from contract we executed for the petroleum trust fund (PTF) 
Purpose for the supply and installations of oil-pipeline to 
Port-Harcourt and Warri Refineries.

This contract has been executed and full payments have been made 
to the contractors who executed these contract leaving behind 
us$15 million as an over-invoice amount for we the committee members.

In view of this, my colleagues have mandated me to look for a 
foreign partner abroad who will receive

These fund on our behalf. Which means that you will provide us with any account
of your
choice where we can lodge these fund immediately.

I will be visiting your country upon your confirmation in receipt of fund in
your
nominated account to know you better and discuss investment or importation of
goods back
to our country.

DISBURSEMENT OF THE FUND IS AS FOLLOWS:
30% of the total sum will be your share
While 65% will be for me and my colleagues
5% will be an outstanding amount to settle any incurred expenses during the
transfer.

WE ASSURE YOU THAT THIS TRANSACTION IS 100% RISK FREE AND VERY LEGITIMATE AS
ALL
MODALITIES HAVE BEEN PERFECTED BY US WITH OUR CONNECTION IN GOVERNMENT.

What matters most is honesty on your side and for you to keep everything
confidential
until this fund is dully remitted into your nominated account.

If this business interests you, please do not hesitate to email me as a matter
of urgency
with your contact phone and fax numbers so that I can call you for more details
for your
understanding

Cheers and God bless you.

ENGR. PETER ESEMUSA

messages.body:
Dear Sir,

My business partners from St. Petersburg, Russia has kindly asked me to deal
with this
matter. They have some comments and questions. If you are kind to verify these,
so they
will be no misunderstandings left in our side.

According to your letter the sum we talking about is:

"the sum of us$15million.(FIFTEEN THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS ONLY)"

You have told us two sums $15 000 000 and $15 000. My partners are quite strict
with these
kind of matters and we need to know which sum is correct.

Secondly:

"DISBURSEMENT OF THE FUND IS AS FOLLOWS:
30% of the total sum will be your share
While 65% will be for me and my colleagues
5% will be an outstanding amount to settle any incurred expenses during the
transfer."

If the 30% share is counted from $15 000 it will be $4 500. If that is correct
my partners
have no interest what so ever. In any case the minimum share they will accept
is 60%. If
you are happy with this, let us know.

Can you contact me to verify these matters.

Kind Regards

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
Tuupovaara

PS.
I enclose your original letter at the end of this mail.
messages.raw:
MR. KALLE TAPPINEN

Dear Sir,

My business partners from St. Petersburg, Russia has kindly asked me to deal with this matter. They have some comments and questions. If you are kind to verify these, so they will be no misunderstandings left in our side.

According to your letter the sum we talking about is:
"the sum of us$15million.(FIFTEEN THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS ONLY)"

You have told us two sums $15 000 000 and $15 000. My partners are quite strict with these kind of matters and we need to know which sum is correct.

Secondly:

"DISBURSEMENT OF THE FUND IS AS FOLLOWS:
30% of the total sum will be your share
While 65% will be for me and my colleagues
5% will be an outstanding amount to settle any incurred expenses during the transfer."

If the 30% share is counted from $15 000 it will be $4 500. If that is correct my partners have no interest what so ever. In any case the minimum share they will accept is 60%. If you are happy with this, let us know.

Can you contact me to verify these matters.

Kind Regards

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
Tuupovaara

PS. I enclose your original letter at the end of this mail.

messages.body:
ATT: Kalle Tappinen, CEO
        Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
        Tuupovaara

DEAR SIR,

THANKS FOR YOUR REPLY TO OUR BUSINESS PROPOSAL TO YOU. AFTER READING YOUR MAIL,
I QUICKLY
CALLED A MEETING WITH MY COLLEAGUES TO INFORM THEN ABOUT YOUR REQUEST AND WE
CONCLUDED AS
FOLLOWS:

WE HAVE UNANIMOUSLY AGREED TO MAKE YOU SHARE INSTEAD OF $4.5 WE NOW MAKE IT TO
$5MILLION
NO MORE NO LESS.

THEIR IS NO WAY WE CAB GIVE YOU SUCH AMOUNT 60% THAT WILL AMOUNT TO $9MILLION
OUT OF
$15MILLION IT WILL REMAIN $6MILLION IMPOSSIBLE.

WE ARE FOUR MEMBERS OF OUR GROUP HOW DO WE SHARE $6M AND YOU ONLY WILL OBTAIN
$9M ON WAY.

I WANT US TO DISCUSS THIS BY PHONE SO YOU CAN CALL ME AT TEL: +234-803-7145080
OR EMAIL ME
WITH YOUR PHONE NUMBER SO THAT WE CAN DISCUSS THIS MATTER.

WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU ASAP

PETER

messages.body:
Dear Sir,

First of all thank you for your quick and clarifying answer.

I will present your proposal to my principals who will make the final decision
in this
matter. I will stress the need of quick answer to them. We will have a meeting
tomorrow or
a day after that. I hope I can give you an answer before the weekend.

Our Business Controller Mr. Georg C. Rosenlew had a meeting today in Berlin
with our
German reprensative Mr. Heinz Harald Rummenigge. They shortly discussed this
matter during
a lunch. According to Mr. Rosenlew they saw possibilities in your proposal. But
they are
not the ones making desicions.

I will get back to you when I have more information.

Kind Regards

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
Tuupovaara

MR. KALLE TAPPINEN

Our Business Controller Mr. Georg C. Rosenlew had a meeting today in Berlin with our German reprensative Mr. Heinz Harald Rummenigge. They shortly discussed this matter during a lunch. According to Mr. Rosenlew they saw possibilities in your proposal. But they are not the ones making desicions.

messages.body:
Dear Sir,

For your information:

I have finished a meeting with my clients who were interested in your proposal.
They
showed "green light" to this project. They were not satisfied with the fee they
are
receiving, but is it that a case in all projects. Anyway, our Russian clients
see this as
a long-term partnership with several similar actions in the future.

Right after the meeting I personally made the phone call to the number you gave
me. I had
the pleasure to talk with your partner Mr. Michael Balaton. It turned out he
will be in
London tomorrow. I have arranged a meeting with him and our London presentative
Ms.
Victoria Kilminster. I believe it is best that they work out details face to
face, and
after that both sides can make arrangements necessary for the transfer. Since
Mr. Balaton
thinks this is ok, I assume you all have discussed about it beforehand.

If you like, I will keep you personally informed about the way things progress
in our side
and how we feel about it. I believe, Mr. Balaton will explain all the details
to you and
your other partners.

Kind Regards,

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
Tuupovaara
messages.raw:
MR. KALLE TAPPINEN

Tappinen makes a "phone call" and Mr. Balaton arrives to the scene. Enemusa shows signs of panic.

Dear Sir,

For your information:

I have finished a meeting with my clients who were interested in your proposal. They showed "green light" to this project. They were not satisfied with the fee they are receiving, but is it that a case in all projects. Anyway, our Russian clients see this as a long-term partnership with several similar actions in the future.

Right after the meeting I personally made the phone call to the number you gave me. I had the pleasure to talk with your partner Mr. Michael Balaton. It turned out he will be in London tomorrow. I have arranged a meeting with him and our London presentative Ms. Victoria Kilminster. I believe it is best that they work out details face to face, and after that both sides can make arrangements necessary for the transfer. Since Mr. Balaton thinks this is ok, I assume you all have discussed about it beforehand.

If you like, I will keep you personally informed about the way things progress in our side and how we feel about it. I believe, Mr. Balaton will explain all the details to you and your other partners.

Kind Regards,

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
Tuupovaara

messages.body:
Dear Peter,

I am confused. The number I called was the one you have sent me. It was Mr.
Balaton who
answered the phone. At first I thought I have chosen a wrong number. But it was
Mr.
Balaton who mentioned your name, not me. I got a little suspicious and I asked
more
questions, and he knew the sums of money you have mentioned. Also he knew you
raised the
fee me and my clients are receiving. How did he knew all that? What is going
on?

Kind Regards,

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
Tuupovaara
messages.raw:
MR. KALLE TAPPINEN

Dear Peter,

I am confused. The number I called was the one you have sent me. It was Mr. Balaton who answered the phone. At first I thought I have chosen a wrong number. But it was Mr. Balaton who mentioned your name, not me. I got a little suspicious and I asked more questions, and he knew the sums of money you have mentioned. Also he knew you raised the fee me and my clients are receiving. How did he knew all that? What is going on?

Kind Regards,

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
Tuupovaara

messages.body:
Peter,

I tried to call to number you gave. There was the same Mr. Balaton who
answered. I didn't
mention anything about you and your mails. I pretended I was just checking,
that
tomorrow's meeting with him and Ms. Kilminster is still ok for him.

I will leave soon to spend a long weekend with my family. We will travel to
north to the
cabin we have rented, so I will be unreachable till monday. I have promised
this trip to
my family few months ago, so better go there.

I try to reach Ms. Kilminster before I leave to warn him about Mr. Balaton.

Kind Regards,

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
Tuupovaara

Peter,

I tried to call to number you gave. There was the same Mr. Balaton who answered. I didn't mention anything about you and your mails. I pretended I was just checking, that tomorrow's meeting with him and Ms. Kilminster is still ok for him.

I will leave soon to spend a long weekend with my family. We will travel to north to the cabin we have rented, so I will be unreachable till monday. I have promised this trip to my family few months ago, so better go there.

I try to reach Ms. Kilminster before I leave to warn him about Mr. Balaton.

Kind Regards,

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd
Tuupovaara

messages.body:
Peter,

I have just returned from my weekend trip. There was a memo from Ms. Kilminster
waiting.
According to it everything went very well on last Friday.

She and Mr. Balaton worked out all the details. It will take us today and
tomorrow to
arrange and repair things so everything will work out fine. After that we will
be ready in
our side for the money transfer.

Since all has went so well we have decided, that Ms. Kilminster and Mr. Balaton
will work
together with this project. According to Mr. Balaton this arrangement is ok to
you and
other partners.

Since Mr. Balaton has given you a full report also you and your other partners
already are
aware of all the details required now on.

Kind Regards

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd.
Tuupovaara
messages.raw:
MR. KALLE TAPPINEN

Tappinen returns from his trip and tells good news to Enemusa. Some confusion and anger rise.

Peter,

I have just returned from my weekend trip. There was a memo from Ms. Kilminster waiting. According to it everything went very well on last Friday.

She and Mr. Balaton worked out all the details. It will take us today and tomorrow to arrange and repair things so everything will work out fine. After that we will be ready in our side for the money transfer.

Since all has went so well we have decided, that Ms. Kilminster and Mr. Balaton will work together with this project. According to Mr. Balaton this arrangement is ok to you and other partners.

Since Mr. Balaton has given you a full report also you and your other partners already are aware of all the details required now on.

Kind Regards

Kalle Tappinen, CEO

Tuupovaara

messages.body:
Dear Peter,

We were faster than I expected. I just talked with Ms. Kilminster and she has
done
everything required from our side.

I have also talked with my good friend . He has known Mr. Balaton for a long time and guarantees he is not a
fraudster. He
has not asked any money in advance. Which should sound strange, by the way. I
don't know
what is there between you two, but I suggest who solve it as soon as possible.

As you know I must report to my clients how this operation is developing. And
right now
there are not pleased what they have heard. They are getting suspicious towards
you, I
don't know why.

Kind Regards

Kalle Tappinen, CEO

MR. KALLE TAPPINEN

Despite all things are running smoothly.

Dear Peter,

We were faster than I expected. I just talked with Ms. Kilminster and she has done everything required from our side.

I have also talked with my good friend Dr. Sam Okobi from the Federal Ministry of Mines & Power. He has known Mr. Balaton for a long time and guarantees he is not a fraudster. As you know I must report to my clients how this operation is developing. And right now there are not pleased what they have heard. They are getting suspicious towards you, I don't know why.

Kind Regards

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd.

messages.body:
Dear Peter,

I have just returned from Switzerland where I met Mr. Michael Balaton with our
Business
Controller Mr. Georg C. Rosenlew.

It is my pleasure to tell you, that money has been transfered and we and our
clients have
received our fee. None of the things you threated never happened or were
brought up.

Since this has been just a succesful endeavor, it is a great pleasure to
express our
gratitude to you Peter and your partners from me and behalf of our clients.

All the best in the future.

Kalle Tappinen, CEO
Kallaveden Kala & Kukko Ltd.
